SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage FROM folderholder INNER JOIN imageversion ON folderholder.ivid = imageversion.ivid WHERE folderid = #id#
ORDER BY photographdate
ORDER BY versiontitle
ORDER BY people
ORDER BY site
ORDER BY byline
ORDER BY createdate
ASC
DESC
LIMIT $start$, $itemsPerPage$

SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage FROM categoryholder INNER JOIN imageversion ON categoryholder.ivid = imageversion.ivid WHERE categoryid = #id#
ORDER BY photographdate
ORDER BY versiontitlelng$usedLanguage$
ORDER BY people
ORDER BY sitelng$usedLanguage$
ORDER BY byline
ORDER BY createdate
ASC
DESC

, 1 as usedLanguage FROM imageversion WHERE licvalid <= #value#

SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage FROM imageversion WHERE createdate > #start# AND createdate < #end# ORDER BY createdate DESC

SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage
FROM imageversion
FROM imageversion WHERE imageversion.ivid IN (SELECT DISTINCT aclimage.ivid FROM aclimage WHERE
((aclimage.principalid = #groupPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 1) OR (aclimage.principalid = #userPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 2))
)
ORDER BY photographdate DESC
ORDER BY createdate DESC
LIMIT 0,#count#
